item.title: Two Sum
item.description: Problem Statement Given an array of integers, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to a specific target. You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice. Questions to ask Is the input array already sorted? Is The input array mutable or read only? Solution There are three main approaches to solve this problem: Naive, Time Optimized,Memory Optimized.
